remarks: A universal vertex has ` n - 1 ` neighbors in a graph with ` n ` vertices, a biconditional version of ~ uvtxnm1nbgra .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.)
statement: uvtxhashnb $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ V e. Fin /\ N e. V ) -> ( N e. ( V UnivVertex E ) <-> ( # ` ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) ) = ( ( # ` V ) - 1 ) ) ) $.
